entry.title: Combined summary - some feedbacks
entry.summary: A Bitcoin client user, Roger Pack, has provided feedback on his experience with the software. He suggests that it would be helpful for the client to prompt users to set a password for their wallets upon startup and display a message informing users that synchronization with the network will take several hours before they can begin using the software. Another user suggests implementing a "first-use wizard" to improve the user experience. Roger Pack also reports experiencing crashes on startup after synchronizing with the network on the OS X client and offers to provide a backtrace if he can reproduce the issue.The writer of this post is having difficulty locating the "create new post" link on the forum and provides feedback for the client's developers. The feedback includes the need for the client to ask users if they want to encrypt their wallet with a password when they first start it up, the issue of crashing on startup for the OS X client after synchronizing with the network, and being unable to create new posts or replies on the forum. The writer offers to provide a backtrace if they can reproduce the error.
